message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try 125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $115. Can you see your way to that?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can do 120, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I think we're really close, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $118. Can you consider that?
